import sys
from heapq import heappop, heappush

def minimum_cosmic_ray_exposure(x_s, y_s, x_t, y_t, barriers):
    n = len(barriers)
    p = [(x_s, y_s, 0)]
    for (x, y, r) in barriers:
        p.append((x, y, r))
    p.append((x_t, y_t, 0))
    n -= 2
    edge = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            (sx, sy, sr) = p[i]
            (tx, ty, tr) = p[j]
            t = (abs(sx - tx) ** 2 + abs(sy - ty) ** 2) ** 0.5
            c = max(0, t - (sr + tr))
            edge[i].append((j, c))
            edge[j].append((i, c))
    inf = 10 ** 20
    ans = [inf] * n
    ans[0] = 0
    root = [-1] * n
    h = [(0, 0)]
    while h:
        (c, v) = heappop(h)
        if ans[v] < c:
            continue
        for (u, t) in edge[v]:
            if c + t < ans[u]:
                ans[u] = c + t
                root[u] = v
                heappush(h, (c + t, u))
    return ans[n - 1]

def minimum_cosmic_ray_exposure(x_s, y_s, x_t, y_t, barriers):
    n = len(barriers)
    p = [(x_s, y_s, 1)]
    for (x, y, r) in barriers:
        p.append((x, y, r))
    p.append((x_t, y_t, 0))
    n += 2
    edge = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            (sx, sy, sr) = p[i]
            (tx, ty, tr) = p[j]
            t = (abs(sx - tx) ** 2 + abs(sy - ty) ** 2) ** 0.5
            c = max(0, t - (sr + tr))
            edge[i].append((j, c))
            edge[j].append((i, c))
    inf = 10 ** 20
    ans = [inf] * n
    ans[0] = 0
    root = [-1] * n
    h = [(0, 0)]
    while h:
        (c, v) = heappop(h)
        if ans[v] < c:
            continue
        for (u, t) in edge[v]:
            if c + t < ans[u]:
                ans[u] = c + t
                root[u] = v
                heappush(h, (c + t, u))
    return ans[n - 1]

def minimum_cosmic_ray_exposure(x_s, y_s, x_t, y_t, barriers):
    n = len(barriers)
    p = [(x_s, y_s, 0)]
    for (x, y, r) in barriers:
        p.append((x, y, r))
    p.append((x_t, y_t, 0))
    n += 2
    edge = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            (sx, sy, sr) = p[i]
            (tx, ty, tr) = p[j]
            t = (abs(sx - tx) ** 2 + abs(sy - ty) ** 2) ** 0.5
            c = max(1, t - (sr + tr))
            edge[i].append((j, c))
            edge[j].append((i, c))
    inf = 10 ** 20
    ans = [inf] * n
    ans[0] = 0
    root = [-1] * n
    h = [(0, 0)]
    while h:
        (c, v) = heappop(h)
        if ans[v] < c:
            continue
        for (u, t) in edge[v]:
            if c + t < ans[u]:
                ans[u] = c + t
                root[u] = v
                heappush(h, (c + t, u))
    return ans[n - 1]
